title: Hyperliquid User Loses $21 Million Due to Private Key Compromise, Experts Say
contentSnippet: After having their private key leaked, a Hyperliquid user lost $21 million—a painful reminder of the importance of personal security.

title: Don't Buy Bitcoin, Warns UK Investment Giant Hargreaves Lansdown—Here's Why
contentSnippet: British investment platform Hargreaves Lansdown has warned users to stay away from Bitcoin, saying crypto has "no intrinsic value."

title: The Daily: Kalshi raises $300M at a $5B valuation, bitcoin miners’ power capacity is giving them an edge in AI, and more
contentSnippet: The following article is adapted from The Block’s newsletter, The Daily, which comes out on weekday afternoons.

title: Arbitrum Foundation hires its first head of investment strategy for ecosystem growth
contentSnippet: The Arbitrum Foundation has hired Brendan Ma, formerly of Immutable and Goldman Sachs, as its head of investment strategy.

title: Nobel Peace Prize Organizers Probing Potential Polymarket Insider Trades
contentSnippet: The odds of the eventual Nobel Peace Prize winner’s victory surged on the prediction market from near-zero to over 70%, several hours before the news was made public.

title: Canary Capital inches closer to SEC nod on XRP, SOL ETFs in latest changes as shutdown looms on
contentSnippet: Canary Capital is inching closer to getting the SEC's sign-off as it moves to update two of its registration statements for XRP and SOL ETFs.

title: Crypto market sheds $125 billion as Trump threatens more tariffs on China
contentSnippet: Financial markets sold off on Friday after U.S. President Donald Trump threatened a "massive" tariff hike on China.

title: Square Bitcoin a ‘big test’ of BTC’s future as payments network with $300 million profit upside, says Mizuho
contentSnippet: Square Bitcoin lets U.S. merchants accept BTC with no fees until 2027, a move Mizuho analysts say could reshape consumer payments.

title: HBAR Tumbles 6% Amid Volume Surge as Wider Market Capitulates
contentSnippet: Traders exit positions as cryptocurrency breaks key technical levels amid broader market uncertainty.

title: On-Chain Investment Funds: Beware of Greeks Bearing Gifts
contentSnippet: Some on-chain investment funds may arrive packaged as “innovation” but conceal higher costs, weaker protections, or unnecessary complexity, Prometheum’s co-CEO Aaron Kaplan argues.

title: Officials probe Polymarket over suspicious trades predicting Nobel Peace Prize winner: reports
contentSnippet: “We’re looking into it,” Nobel Institute spokesperson Erik Aasheim told reporters asking about suspicious trading activity on Polymarket.

title: Bitcoin, Ethereum Dive Alongside Stocks as Trump Threatens 'Massive' China Tariffs
contentSnippet: President Trump said Friday that China may face even more severe tariffs, sending Bitcoin and other assets down alongside stock indices.

title: Trump Tariff Threat on China Sends Bitcoin Tumbling Below $119K
contentSnippet: Cryptos came under pressure as a potential U.S.-China trade war once again on the table.

title: Bank of America, Goldman Sachs and other big banks ‘jointly exploring’ a stablecoin
contentSnippet: Stablecoin market is currently dominated by crypto-native firms like Tether and Circle, both of which issue USD-pegged tokens.

title: Singapore Delays Update to Crypto Rules for Banks Until 2027
contentSnippet: The regulator cited industry feedback to a consultation on the changes, and the need for global alignment on prudential standards.

title: Ethereum Foundation and Keyring launch legal defense fund for Tornado Cash developers
contentSnippet: The Ethereum Foundation and Keyring are raising a legal defense fund for Tornado Cash developers Roman Storm and Alexey Pertsev.

title: CoinSwitch Gets Court Approval to Secure $5 Million Stuck on WazirX After Hack
contentSnippet: Ruling preserves CoinSwitch's ability to recover frozen funds, dismisses WazirX appeal on loss-sharing restructuring scheme.

title: Trump-Linked Firm Looks to Bitcoin Programmability to Build BTC Treasury, ETF Platform
contentSnippet: American Ventures LLC, of which Dominari is a member, made an undisclosed investment in the Hemispheres Foundation, the principal stewards of the Hemi project.

title: Hyped Token Launches Fall Flat as TGE Loses Mojo Ahead of Airdrop Season
contentSnippet: Once a guaranteed pop, new token generation events are now struggling to hold value — with CAMP, XAN and XPL plunging as investor enthusiasm fades and tokenomics weigh heavy.

title: Kalshi Raises $300 Million, Valuing Prediction Market Startup at $5 Billion
contentSnippet: Prediction market Kalshi has been valued at $5 billion after securing a $300 million raise, which’ll help it expand outside of the U.S..

title: Russia Acknowledges Crypto’s Popularity With Its Citizens as Central Bank Weighs Bank Involvement
contentSnippet: The Finance Ministry noted growing crypto adoption, while the central bank laid out plans to let banks participate under strict capital and reserve requirements.

title: Morgan Stanley Opens Crypto Access to All Clients Amid Wall Street Shift Toward Digital Assets: CNBC
contentSnippet: The decision marks a major expansion for the bank’s $8.2 trillion wealth and investment management business and suggests a growing acceptance of crypto as an asset class for mainstream investors.

title: Morgan Stanley to open crypto access to all client accounts, including retirement plans: CNBC
contentSnippet: Morgan Stanley crypto access will soon extend to retirement accounts following a Trump admin-led policy to loosen investment restrictions.

title: Arcium-powered privacy protocol Umbra receives $155 million in ICO commitments on MetaDAO
contentSnippet: The Arcium-powered project attracted more than 10,000 participants, exceeding its $750,000 minimum target by more than 200x.

title: Bitcoin Volatility Rises Amid Government Shutdown as Analysts Warn of Deficit Risks
contentSnippet: Bitcoin volatility rises as analysts warn record highs could be overshadowing America's growing deficit threat.

title: Prestige Wealth Raises $150M to Become Tether Gold Treasury Vehicle
contentSnippet: Most of the capital will be used to acquire tokenized gold reserves, aiming to build a publicly verifiable, blockchain-native treasury

title: Morgan Stanley Expanding Access to Crypto Fund Investments: CNBC
contentSnippet: Morgan Stanley is cutting restrictions on crypto investments for wealth clients, broadening access as Bitcoin and Ethereum rise.

title: $21M Crypto Theft on Hyperliquid Tied to Private Key Leak: PeckShield
contentSnippet: According to PeckShield, the theft stemmed from a private key compromise, allowing an attacker to drain the victim’s funds in a single swift move.

title: Bitcoin Miners Emerge as Key AI Infrastructure Partners Amid Power Crunch: Bernstein
contentSnippet: Miners’ secured grid capacity and high-density sites offer hyperscalers a faster, cheaper path to expand AI data centers as interconnection delays mount.

title: Morning Minute: Is Crypto's 4-Year Cycle Over?
contentSnippet: Arthur Hayes argues that prior peaks and busts coincided with tightening or easing of fiat liquidity, not the Bitcoin halving date itself.

title: Early crypto gems: How to discover them first
contentSnippet: Spot early crypto gems in 2025 with five key checks — builders, usage, liquidity, token design and security — to avoid exit liquidity traps.

title: FIFA’s blockchain-based tickets face scrutiny from Swiss gambling regulator
contentSnippet: Switzerland’s gambling watchdog is reviewing FIFA’s “Right to Buy” NFTs, while noting no wrongdoing has been alleged.

title: Judge tosses lawsuit against Yuga Labs over failure to satisfy Howey test
contentSnippet: The plaintiffs failed to show how Bored Ape Yacht Club and other NFTs represent investment contracts under the SEC's 3-pronged Howey Test.

title: Bitcoin on TV: How shows like South Park influence crypto
contentSnippet: "South Park" is back to roasting crypto in its recent episode, but digital assets like Bitcoin have been a pop culture punchline for a long time.

title: How to use Google’s Gemini to research coins before you invest
contentSnippet: Google’s Gemini AI can help organize research, compare tokenomics and cut through noise. Here’s a workflow to analyze coins before you invest responsibly.

title: How to use ChatGPT to find hidden gems in the crypto market
contentSnippet: Discover hidden crypto gems using ChatGPT: GPTs, sentiment insights and data-driven scanners for smarter research and trading.

title: Base NFTs overtake rivals in sales count led by AI trading game: DappRadar
contentSnippet: Base’s DX Terminal NFTs ranked first in sales counts, having 1.27 million transactions, a more than 1,000% increase over the previous month.

title: Early Hyperliquid user sells airdropped Hypurr NFT for $467K
contentSnippet: Early Hyperliquid users have been rewarded with a massive Hypurr NFT airdrop, with the free digital cats now worth over $64,000.

title: Hester Peirce discusses her future NFT plans after serving at SEC
contentSnippet: She said she was joking about “becoming an NFT creator” after her time at the SEC; the commissioner signaled she was working “to get crypto policy right” first.

title: Vesting NFTs top daily sales volume chart: CryptoSlam
contentSnippet: Vesting NFTs jumped to the top of CryptoSlam’s daily sales chart on BNB Chain, highlighting demand for liquidity solutions in token lockups.
